name: Haunted Stories
description:
Haunted Stories is a captivating mix of horror and thriller.
Experience several exciting haunted stories, each telling its own independent storyline.
Each playable story contains its own secrets, game mechanics and puzzles to solve.
The lovingly crafted environments tell their own past and invite exploration and investigation. If you think you know what the real story is, be prepared for surprises and unpredictable twists!

Haunted Stories:

Supermarket:
Experience the point of view of a thief who wants to rob a supermarket. He quickly realizes that something is wrong. Strange apparitions cause him to start having doubts... will he get out in one piece?

Western Town:
During the time of the wild west, a traveler wanted to rest in a town and spend a night. Once there, he notices that it is now a ghost town.
Is there a reason for this?

Creepy Forest:
A person visits his hunter friend in his forest cabin. However, it seems to be abandoned.
As he has begun the search for his friend, more and more questions have arisen.
What happened to the hunter?

More stories to follow during the Early Access phase

Game Information:
There will be at least five standalone stories told until the final version, each containing multiple endings and many mysteries.

Each story has its own protagonist and is set in a different time.

Explore the open areas and look out for clues or traces to find out the true story.

The different locations and the different times of the events, also offer varied and exciting game mechanics.

Each story offers multiple endings. Which one will you experience and will it be the true ending?
